title: Shattered
description: One year after Kaiser Noire's rebirth, he has risen to knighthood. Trained by the legendary Seeath Reinhart, Kaiser is sent to quell a rebellious group of deserters in the South forest. His achievements soon put him on a path to discover more about his race and his fate becomes entangled with a kindred spirit.When a young girl named Tessa is saved by a disgraced knight turned mercenary, she forces him to confront the sins of his past. In keeping a promise to the girl, he finds information that could lead him to his lost ward and discover an enemy other than the Glas.While the fates of the realm slowly close in on each other, secrets across the sea begin to stir and shine light on what happened to the Glas four hundred years ago. Will the uncovered truths help defeat the Glas of present day or awaken something worse?
author: K. Vider
